Name: TeamCity - Download Artifact
Description: Downloads the TeamCity artifact from the most recent build of the specified branch.
Author: jeremyalan

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
# Expected parameters:
#  $TeamCityHost     - The domain name and optional port (teamcity.mycompany.com:8080) of the TeamCity build server.
#  $TeamCityUsername - The TeamCity username.
#  $TeamCityPassword - The TeamCity password.
#  $BuildType        - The unique identifier of the TeamCity build configuration.
#  $BranchName       - The name of the branch.
#  $ArtifactName     - The filename of the artifact.
#  $OutputLocation   - The name of the folder where the artifact will be downloaded.

$secure_password = ConvertTo-SecureString $TeamCityPassword -AsPlainText -Force
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($TeamCityUsername, $secure_password)

$resource_identifier = "buildType:$BuildType,branch:$BranchName"

$source = "http://$TeamCityHost/httpAuth/app/rest/builds/$resource_identifier/artifacts/content/$ArtifactName"
$destination = "$OutputLocation\$Artifactname"

Invoke-WebRequest $source -OutFile $destination -Credential $credential

Parameters.Name: TeamCityHost
Parameters.Label: TeamCity Host
Parameters.HelpText:
The domain name and optional port of the TeamCity build server.
(ex. teamcity.mycompany.com:8080)

Parameters.Name: TeamCityUsername
Parameters.Label: TeamCity Username
Parameters.HelpText: The TeamCity username that is used to authenticate the request.  This user must have permissions to download the specified artifact.

Parameters.Name: TeamCityPassword
Parameters.Label: TeamCity Password
Parameters.HelpText: The TeamCity password that is used to authenticate the request.

Parameters.Name: BuildType
Parameters.Label: Build Type ID
Parameters.HelpText: The unique identifier of the TeamCity build configuration.

Parameters.Name: BranchName
Parameters.Label: Branch Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the branch whose artifact is being download.

Parameters.Name: ArtifactName
Parameters.Label: Artifact Name
Parameters.HelpText: The filename of the artifact being downloaded.

Parameters.Name: OutputLocation
Parameters.Label: Output Location
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the folder where the artifact will be downloaded.  The resulting file will match the filename of the artifact being downloaded.
